title: On compliance with the terms and conditions, the building permission shall be given in accordance with the provisions under Section 45 of the MR&TP Act, 1966 to the sectoral development under DRP, first to the Rehabilitation component and thereafter to the free sale component subject to the provisions in clause below
clause_text: On compliance with the terms and conditions, the building permission shall be given in accordance with the provisions under Section 45 of the MR&TP Act, 1966 to the sectoral development under DRP, first to the Rehabilitation component and thereafter to the free sale component subject to the provisions in clause below.
section: Building Permission under Dharavi Redevelopment Project:
